alert.note: Alert for Evangeline; St. Landry (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Lake Charles (Southeast Texas and Southwest Louisiana)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued April 16 at 12:08AM CDT until April 16 at 12:45AM CDT by NWS Lake Charles
info.description: The National Weather Service in Lake Charles has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southeastern Evangeline Parish in central Louisiana... Northeastern St. Landry Parish in central Louisiana... * Until 1245 AM CDT. * At 1207 AM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Ville Platte, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Ville Platte, Palmetto, Morrow, Washington, Whiteville, Big Cane, Prairie Ronde, Indian Lake, Grand Prairie and Lebeau. This includes Interstate 49 between mile markers 24 and 42. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
